text.section: A correctional officer who is denied a right granted by this subtitle may apply to the circuit court of the county where the correctional officer is regularly employed for an order to show cause why the right should not be granted.

The correctional officer may apply for the show cause order:
either individually or through the correctional officers' exclusive bargaining representative who shall have standing for that purpose; and
at any time before the beginning of a hearing by the hearing board.
